mn21:8.4: ojāpaharaṇiyo → ojasāraṇiyo (sya-all); ojaharaṇiyo (mr) | chetvā → tacchetvā (bj, sya-all, pts1ed)
mn21:9.16: Na khvayye → na kho ayye (bj, pts1ed)
mn21:10.6: dhammaṁ mānento, dhammaṁ pūjento, dhammaṁ apacāyamāno → dhammaṁyeva sakkaronto dhammaṁ garukaronto dhammaṁ apacāyamāno (bj, sya-all, pts1ed)
mn21:12.4: vikhaṇeyya → khaṇeyya (bj, cck, pts1ed); khaneyya (sya1ed, sya2ed)
